topics.body:
Everyone's talking about electing American animal presidents and I'm just here being Asian [spoiler]or Hispanic. I don't know what we're supposed to be[/spoiler]

Also, I need to go. I should be holding my girl not wasting time. Good night.

[bq="gasmaskangel"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545c758163687278406d0000#post_545c758163687278406d0000
Fuck it, I'm voting for all animal candidates next election. I remember getting my ballot (I vote absentee) this year and going through it and seeing fucking no one that I want anywhere near government power on it.[/bq]
If anything 2015 is going to be utterly hilarious.''

2015 in a nutshell going to be:
Republicans "Woohoo time for another shutdown"
*five minutes later
"Why do you guys not like us?!"

*SENATOR ARMSTRONG 2016!*
